clickIconToResetPermissions.englishSource: Click on the X icon to reset permissions.

feeInputDescription.message:

feeInputDescription.englishSource:

borrowLandEarn.message: Borrow, Land and Earn on your favorite tokens!
borrowLandEarn.englishSource: Borrow, Land and Earn on your favorite tokens!

zeroSwapCommissionTitle.message: Zero Swap commissions for two weeks - celebrate the $text$ with us!
zeroSwapCommissionTitle.englishSource: Zero Swap commissions for two weeks - celebrate the $text$ with us!

zeroSwapCommissionDescription.message:
From $date1$ till $date2$, Leo users may conduct trades via our router in the $text$ section without our dev commissions.

Enjoy the most lucrative exchange rates and trade without fees in one place.
zeroSwapCommissionDescription.englishSource:
From $date1$ till $date2$, Leo users may conduct trades via our router in the $text$ section without our dev commissions.

Enjoy the most lucrative exchange rates and trade without fees in one place.

minDelegationAmountDescription.message: Your current balance is less than a minimal delegation amount of this baker. That means while the balance is less than $minAmount$ - there will be no payouts.
minDelegationAmountDescription.englishSource: Your current balance is less than a minimal delegation amount of this baker. That means while the balance is less than $minAmount$ - there will be no payouts.

clickOnBakerPrompt.englishSource: Click on the Baker you want to delegate funds to. This list is powered by $link$.

unlockWalletPrompt.englishSource: If you want to save something from already existing wallet - $link$ and unlock it.

acceptTermsInputDescription.englishSource: I have read and agree to the $termsOfUsageLink$ and $privacyPolicyLink$

dcpDelegatingMotivation.message: Delegating your funds to producers is a great way of earning interest on your balance
dcpDelegatingMotivation.englishSource: Delegating your funds to producers is a great way of earning interest on your balance

delegatingMotivation.message: Delegating your funds to bakers is a great way of earning interest on your balance
delegatingMotivation.englishSource: Delegating your funds to bakers is a great way of earning interest on your balance

getTokensDescription.englishSource: You can get tokens from the faucet or transfer them from another wallet or account.

aleoFaucetDescription.message: All distributed credits are for testing purposes and do not have value.
aleoFaucetDescription.englishSource: All distributed credits are for testing purposes and do not have value.

midenFaucetDescription.message: Clicking the button below will copy your address to the clipboard and navigate you to the Miden Faucet.
midenFaucetDescription.englishSource: Clicking the button below will copy your address to the clipboard and navigate you to the Miden Faucet.

aleoFaucetStep1.englishSource: Scan the QR code with your Phone

aleoFaucetStep1Description.message: And click on the prompt it shows you.
aleoFaucetStep1Description.englishSource: And click on the prompt it shows you.

aleoFaucetStep3Description.message: Aleo Faucet will send you credits.
aleoFaucetStep3Description.englishSource: Aleo Faucet will send you credits.

depositToWalletDescription.message: Click on deposit method to get money on your wallet. Use faucet to get free coins!
depositToWalletDescription.englishSource: Click on deposit method to get money on your wallet. Use faucet to get free coins!

contractNotAvailable.message: The contract at this address is not available. Does it exist on this network?

tokenIdInputDescription.englishSource: A non-negative integer number that identifies the asset inside FA2 contract

tokenNameInputDescription.englishSource: Asset name, like 'Bitcoin' for BTC asset.

accountsToRemoveConstraint.englishSource: Your seed phrase will always be able to regenerate this wallet. It is impossible to delete it.

mixtureOfLettersAndNumbers.englishSource: A mixture of letters and numbers.

NO_DECRYPT.englishSource: This app cannot decrypt any record using any of your view keys.

DECRYPT_UPON_REQUEST.englishSource: This app can only decrypt records with your explicit approval. You will be prompted for any decryption request.

AUTO_DECRYPT.englishSource: This app can automatically decrypt any record it needs to without explicit permission only while your wallet is connected. It cannot see your ViewKey.

swapDisclaimerTitle.message: Disclaimer. Beta version, read before using the SWAP section.
swapDisclaimerTitle.englishSource: Disclaimer. Beta version, read before using the SWAP section.

swapDisclaimerContent.message:
Leo wallet only provides an interface to interact with the Aleo Dexes. 

We are not responsible for: DEX issues, displayed tokens, price, exchange rates, and user trading decisions. 

Before using this Swap Section, you should review the relevant documentation to understand how the DEX(AMM) protocols work. 

Using this section is solely the user's responsibility.
swapDisclaimerContent.englishSource:
Leo wallet only provides an interface to interact with the Aleo Dexes. 

We are not responsible for: DEX issues, displayed tokens, price, exchange rates, and user trading decisions. 

Before using this Swap Section, you should review the relevant documentation to understand how the DEX(AMM) protocols work. 

Using this section is solely the user's responsibility.

verifySeedPhraseDescription.message: Fill in the blank fields with the words to verify your Seed Phrase backup
verifySeedPhraseDescription.englishSource: Fill in the blank fields with the words to verify your Seed Phrase backup

addressBalanceDescription.message: After creating an account, you‚Äôll get a unique address ‚Äî your personal identifier in the Aleo blockchain. If you would like to receive and use Aleo credits or Aleo-built tokens in Leo, you should use this address.
addressBalanceDescription.englishSource: After creating an account, you‚Äôll get a unique address ‚Äî your personal identifier in the Aleo blockchain. If you would like to receive and use Aleo credits or Aleo-built tokens in Leo, you should use this address.

addressBalanceHint.message: The balance of your Aleo credits is displayed under the public address.
addressBalanceHint.englishSource: The balance of your Aleo credits is displayed under the public address.

howToStartDescription1.message: To start using your wallet and interacting with the Aleo DApps ecosystem, the account balance must be positive. To do this, top up your address with Aleo Credits coins.
howToStartDescription1.englishSource: To start using your wallet and interacting with the Aleo DApps ecosystem, the account balance must be positive. To do this, top up your address with Aleo Credits coins.

howToStartDescription2.message: You can use the "Buy" button and top up your Aleo Credits balance, using cryptocurrencies, debit, or credit cards.
howToStartDescription2.englishSource: You can use the "Buy" button and top up your Aleo Credits balance, using cryptocurrencies, debit, or credit cards.

howToStartHint.message: Also, you can copy your address and send coins to it from another wallet or Exchange. To copy the address, click on it on the main wallet screen or use ‚ÄúReceive‚Äù.
howToStartHint.englishSource: Also, you can copy your address and send coins to it from another wallet or Exchange. To copy the address, click on it on the main wallet screen or use ‚ÄúReceive‚Äù.

tokensCollectibleDescription1.message: Your balances of FA1.2 and FA2 tokens are displayed on the ‚ÄúTokens‚Äù tab.
tokensCollectibleDescription1.englishSource: Your balances of FA1.2 and FA2 tokens are displayed on the ‚ÄúTokens‚Äù tab.

tokensCollectibleDescription2.message: You can send, check balances, or contract addresses of any token by clicking on it in this section.
tokensCollectibleDescription2.englishSource: You can send, check balances, or contract addresses of any token by clicking on it in this section.

tokensCollectibleHint.message: Your Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) are displayed on the ‚ÄúCollectibles‚Äù tab. Here you can also interact with your own NFTs, see their full view, ID, and contract address.
tokensCollectibleHint.englishSource: Your Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) are displayed on the ‚ÄúCollectibles‚Äù tab. Here you can also interact with your own NFTs, see their full view, ID, and contract address.

profileRpcDescription.message: At the top of the interface, you can see your account robo-icon. By clicking on it, you will see the parameters for interaction with accounts, the settings button, and the extension view mode.
profileRpcDescription.englishSource: At the top of the interface, you can see your account robo-icon. By clicking on it, you will see the parameters for interaction with accounts, the settings button, and the extension view mode.

profileRpcHint1.message: Next, you will see the ‚ÄúNetworks‚Äù selector, which allows you to select a node (RPC) to which your Leo extension will be connected.
profileRpcHint1.englishSource: Next, you will see the ‚ÄúNetworks‚Äù selector, which allows you to select a node (RPC) to which your Leo extension will be connected.

profileRpcHint2.message: If your balance is not displayed, try changing the node.
profileRpcHint2.englishSource: If your balance is not displayed, try changing the node.

profileRpcHint3.message: You can choose from a predefined list or add RPC manually by following these
profileRpcHint3.englishSource: You can choose from a predefined list or add RPC manually by following these

browserVersionIsOutOfDate.message: Your browser version is out of date, we strongly recommend updating to the newest version!
browserVersionIsOutOfDate.englishSource: Your browser version is out of date, we strongly recommend updating to the newest version!

congratsDescription2.message: Now you know about the basic and most important functions of the Leo wallet.
congratsDescription2.englishSource: Now you know about the basic and most important functions of the Leo wallet.

congratsDescription3.message: You can learn all features of the Leo from our ‚ÄúEducational series‚Äù on YouTube.
congratsDescription3.englishSource: You can learn all features of the Leo from our ‚ÄúEducational series‚Äù on YouTube.

congratsDescription4.message: Also, instructions and guides are available in our knowledge base.
congratsDescription4.englishSource: Also, instructions and guides are available in our knowledge base.

congratsDescription5.message: Join our communities in Telegram and Discord.
congratsDescription5.englishSource: Join our communities in Telegram and Discord.

congratsDescription6.message: PS: Good luck exploring the Aleo world!
congratsDescription6.englishSource: PS: Good luck exploring the Aleo world!

attentionDescription.message: Never and under any pretext share your private keys and seed phrase with third parties.
attentionDescription.englishSource: Never and under any pretext share your private keys and seed phrase with third parties.

attentionListItem1.message: Your wallet can be targeted through a browser 0days or via other malicious extension installed;
attentionListItem1.englishSource: Your wallet can be targeted through a browser 0days or via other malicious extension installed;

attentionListItem2.message: The screen can potentially be manipulated by malicious software installed in the system;
attentionListItem2.englishSource: The screen can potentially be manipulated by malicious software installed in the system;

attentionListItem3.message: User‚Äôs host machine can be targeted by malware to steal encrypted wallet;
attentionListItem3.englishSource: User‚Äôs host machine can be targeted by malware to steal encrypted wallet;

attentionListItem4.message: Choosing weak passwords can reduce the ability of a wallet to resist adversarial brute-forcing.
attentionListItem4.englishSource: Choosing weak passwords can reduce the ability of a wallet to resist adversarial brute-forcing.

attentionListTitle2.message: To keep your assets safe, we recommend:
attentionListTitle2.englishSource: To keep your assets safe, we recommend:

attentionListItem5.message: Move your funds from ‚Äúhot‚Äù wallet to ‚Äúcold‚Äù as soon as possible (Leo wallet supports integration with ‚ÄúLedger Nano‚Äù devices);
attentionListItem5.englishSource: Move your funds from ‚Äúhot‚Äù wallet to ‚Äúcold‚Äù as soon as possible (Leo wallet supports integration with ‚ÄúLedger Nano‚Äù devices);

attentionListItem6.message: Use separate browsers for web-surfing and wallet‚Äôs operating;
attentionListItem6.englishSource: Use separate browsers for web-surfing and wallet‚Äôs operating;

attentionListItem7.message: Use one browser‚Äôs tab at a time to make transactions;
attentionListItem7.englishSource: Use one browser‚Äôs tab at a time to make transactions;

attentionListItem8.message: Keep the wallet locked when it is not in usage.
attentionListItem8.englishSource: Keep the wallet locked when it is not in usage.

takeCare.message: Take care of your safety in the crypto world!
takeCare.englishSource: Take care of your safety in the crypto world!

minimumCharsWithAtLeast.message: Minimum 8 characters with at least 1 number

transactionHistoryLost.englishSource: We want to inform you that all transaction history has been lost due to a recent reset of the Aleo Testnet3.

yourAccountIsProtected.message: Your account is protected by an encrypted file instead of a seed phrase.
yourAccountIsProtected.englishSource: Your account is protected by an encrypted file instead of a seed phrase.

downloadAndSecurelyStore.message: Download and securely store the latest version of your encrypted file. This file is essential for account recovery.
downloadAndSecurelyStore.englishSource: Download and securely store the latest version of your encrypted file. This file is essential for account recovery.

chooseImportTypeDescription.message: Restore public balance with your 12-word phrase. To restore private funds, upload the encrypted backup file.
chooseImportTypeDescription.englishSource: Restore public balance with your 12-word phrase. To restore private balance, upload an encrypted backup file.

importWithSeedPhraseDescription.message: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.
importWithSeedPhraseDescription.englishSource: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.

importWithEncryptedWalletFileDescription.message: Upload your encrypted wallet file to securely import your account. Your data remains private, with only hashed information stored on-chain
importWithEncryptedWalletFileDescription.englishSource: Upload your encrypted wallet file to securely import your account. Your data remains private, with only hashed information stored on-chain

onlyMidenSeedPhrasesAreSupported.englishSource: Only Miden Seed phrases are supported.

resetRequiredDescription.message: Miden Testnet has upgraded to bech32 account IDs to improve your experience. To keep using your wallet, please restore from a backup file or seed phrase, or create a new one.
resetRequiredDescription.englishSource: Miden Testnet has upgraded to bech32 account IDs to improve your experience. To keep using your wallet, please restore from a backup file or seed phrase, or create a new one.

forgotPasswordDescription.message: If you've forgotten your password, you need to sign out and re-import your account. After that, you can create a new password.
forgotPasswordDescription.englishSource: If you've forgotten your password, you need to sign out and re-import your account. After that, you can create a new password.

forgotPasswordSecondDescription.message: Do not sign out unless you know your 12-word Seed phrase or have an encrypted backup file.
forgotPasswordSecondDescription.englishSource: Do not sign out unless you know your 12-word Seed phrase or have an encrypted backup file.

enterPasswordToEncrypt.message: Enter a password to encrypt your wallet file. You'll need this password to restore your wallet later.

noOtherAccountsDescription.message: You have not created any other accounts yet

sendTransactionRequests.message: Let it send you requests for transactions
sendTransactionRequests.englishSource: Let it send you requests for transactions

fundsStayInWallet.message: Funds will not leave your wallet until you execute a transaction
fundsStayInWallet.englishSource: Funds will not leave your wallet until you execute a transaction

accessWillBeGranted.message: Access to the following data will be granted
accessWillBeGranted.englishSource: Access to the following data will be granted

confirmationRequired.message: Confirmation is required every time account data is requested
confirmationRequired.englishSource: Confirmation is required every time account data is requested

doNotShareEncryptedWalletFileDescription.message: With the file and password, anyone can access your wallet.
doNotShareEncryptedWalletFileDescription.englishSource: With the file and password, anyone can access your wallet.

transactionWillProceedInBackground.message: Transaction will proceed in the background
transactionWillProceedInBackground.englishSource: Transaction will proceed in the background

privateFeeDescription.message: Transaction fee is processed publicly on the blockchain.
privateFeeDescription.englishSource: Transaction fee is processed publicly on the blockchain.

noPrivateTokensForFee.message: You have no Private tokens. Convert Public tokens to Private to use them as Fee.
noPrivateTokensForFee.englishSource: You have no Private tokens. Convert Public tokens to Private to use them as Fee.

noPublicTokensForFee.message: You have no Public tokens. Convert Private tokens to Public to use them as Fee.
noPublicTokensForFee.englishSource: You have no Public tokens. Convert Private tokens to Public to use them as Fee.

delegateTransactionTooltip.message: Configure delegation of proof generation to a remote server. This will speed up proof generation but disclose the transaction details to a trusted server.
delegateTransactionTooltip.englishSource: Configure delegation of proof generation to a remote server. This will speed up proof generation but disclose the transaction details to a trusted server.

doNotCloseWindowNavigateHome.message: Do not close this window. You will be navigated back to the home page after the transaction is generated
doNotCloseWindowNavigateHome.englishSource: Do not close this window. You will be navigated back to the home page after the transaction is generated

doNotCloseWindowAutoClose.message: Do not close this window. Window will auto-close after the transaction is generated
doNotCloseWindowAutoClose.englishSource: Do not close this window. Window will auto-close after the transaction is generated

transactionSuccessDescription.message: Your transaction was successfully processed and confirmed on the network.
transactionSuccessDescription.englishSource: Your transaction was successfully processed and confirmed on the network.

transactionErrorDescription.message: There was an error processing your transaction. Please try again.
transactionErrorDescription.englishSource: There was an error processing your transaction. Please try again.

onChainAccountDescription.message: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.
onChainAccountDescription.englishSource: Use an existing 12 word recovery phrase. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.

offChainAccountDescription.message: Fast, private operations with minimal fees, bypassing direct blockchain interaction.
offChainAccountDescription.englishSource: Fast, private operations with minimal fees, bypassing direct blockchain interaction.

chooseAccountTypeDescription.message: Select how you want to interact with the blockchain -- on-chain or off-chain.
chooseAccountTypeDescription.englishSource: Select how you want to interact with the blockchain -- on-chain or off-chain.

canAddMultipleAccountsLater.message: You can add and manage multiple account types later within the wallet.
canAddMultipleAccountsLater.englishSource: You can add and manage multiple account types later within the wallet.

transactionVerifiedSuccessfully.message: The transaction has been successfully verified. You can now claim your tokens.
transactionVerifiedSuccessfully.englishSource: The transaction has been successfully verified. You can now claim your tokens.

transactionFileCouldNotBeVerified.message: The uploaded transaction file could not be verified. Ensure the file is valid and try again.
transactionFileCouldNotBeVerified.englishSource: The uploaded transaction file could not be verified. Ensure the file is valid and try again.

sharePrivateNoteDataForAccount.message: Share all private note data for account
sharePrivateNoteDataForAccount.englishSource: Share all private note data for account

transactionAffectsAccountStorage.message: This transaction affects your account storage. Review the raw summary to verify
transactionAffectsAccountStorage.englishSource: This transaction affects your account storage. Review the raw summary to verify

transactionProcessingDescription.message: The uploaded transaction file is being processed to verify its details. Please do not refresh or close the app.
transactionProcessingDescription.englishSource: The uploaded transaction file is being processed to verify its details. Please do not refresh or close the app.

walletMayBeOffline.message: Wallet may be offline or out of sync.
walletMayBeOffline.englishSource: Wallet may be offline or out of sync.

noteConsumptionError.message: There was an error consuming your note. Please try again.
noteConsumptionError.englishSource: There was an error consuming your note. Please try again.

recallBlocksDescription.message: If the recipient does not accept the transaction within this time, the funds will be returned to you.
recallBlocksDescription.englishSource: If the recipient does not accept the transaction within this time, the funds will be returned to you.

byProceeding.message: By proceeding, you agree to the
byProceeding.englishSource: By proceeding, you agree to the

enterDecryptionPassword.message: Enter the password you set when exporting your wallet. This will decrypt the file and restore access.
enterDecryptionPassword.englishSource: Enter the password you set when exporting your wallet. This will decrypt the file and restore access.
